raw_affiliation_strings: THE AUTHOR:  is a Naval Reserve Officer currently attached to a unit (5–8) of the Navy's Research Program (ONR). He has had a wide range of experience in the Navy both while on active duty during World War II and Korea, as well as in the Reserve Program. His civilian experience has included electrical and mechanical design, systems engineering and advanced engineering in Naval Warfare as well as Materials Science. Groves is a member of the ASNE, The Marine Technology Society and a Fellow of The Washington Academy of Science plus several other scientific and engineering societies.
